name: 曾百由
objective: 1.簡介 2.二極體 3. 雙極性接面電晶體(BJT) 4. 場效電晶體(FET) 5.金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET) 6.線性電路 7. 非線性電路應用 8.運算放大器
schedule:
1. Semiconductor Diodes
2. Diode Applications
3. Bipolar Junction Transistors
4-5. BJT DC Biasing
6. Midterm 1
7. Field-Effect Transistors
8-9. FET Biasing
10-11. BJT Transistor Modeling
12. Midterm 2
13-14. BJT Small-Signal Analysis
15. Two-Port System Approach
16. Operational Amplifiers
17. Op-Amp Applications
18. Final
scorePolicy:
Midterm 1 20%, 
Midterm 2 25%, 
Final 30%
Quiz and Attendance 25%
materials: Boylestad & Nashelsky, “Electronic Devices and Circuit Theory”, Prentice Hall
